name: bounded_options_v2_validation
description: Validate the bounded options v2 refactor (case matrix, position awareness, bluff gating, stack depth, emotional window shift). Mix of play styles to exercise TAG/LAG/passive profiles. Compare lean-bounded with style-aware options vs CaseBot baseline.
hypothesis: The v2 case matrix with position awareness and style-aware profiles should produce more aggressive value betting (fewer missed value bets on strong hands) and better fold discipline (fewer bad calls) compared to the old system.
